    • Constructor Detail

      • OracleDatabase

        public OracleDatabase(java.lang.String server,
                      int port,
                      java.lang.String username,
                      char[] password)
        Constructor of Oracle Database Connector
        Parameters:
        server - server address. It can be a DNS, an IP Address or a localhost (127.0.0.1 for local PC)
        port - port used to stablish connection with the server
        username - user name to login on the database server
        password - password for the given username
